title: Flipped Learning-Based Educational Program for Enhancing Large-Scale Cardiac Assessment Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Physiology and Human Anatomy Knowledge, Understanding of Fundamental Medical Skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening patient-centered approaches for non-cardiology majors. Aims to systematically acquire diagnostic skills through learner collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze patient conditions by applying a six-step systematic cardiac assessment framework.
Learners can extract at least 80% of key information from patient histories before auscultation.
Learners can perform clinical judgments with 70% accuracy through jugular venous pressure assessment and identification of key heart sounds.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
